<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This prevents generating extract instructions that have the offset of 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// One of the reasons for &quot;extract&quot; is to put a sequence of bits in a regis-</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ter, starting at offset 0 (so that these bits can then be used by an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &quot;insert&quot;). If the bits are already at offset 0, it is better not to gene-</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// rate &quot;extract&quot;, since logical bit operations can be merged into compound</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions (as opposed to &quot;extract&quot;).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43" lineLink="#a763848fa42709c786cb57cf63eea6e1c"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cl/opt">cl::opt&lt;bool&gt;</a> <a href="#a763848fa42709c786cb57cf63eea6e1c">NoSR0</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;extract-nosr0&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#ac12e6a8f3a1b511f0dee2ed6de0ae806">cl::init</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#a68075925a54790e71ca790e1d4f21a40a263ac008d8d31f13ce460395fc4cf7e6">cl::Hidden</a>,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CM = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (shl (lshr x, #sr), #sl)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">    LogicalSR = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a313a633eb3049b90e931206183e1251ea6da89265a9a8b0b28eb4946bb2ec0c6d">Match</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a25d956d9e0beadd47ce4bc255dfa811d">match</a>(In, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#ac1c7b78fe67245930be18441b77de500">m&#95;Shl</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#ab8546ee1aaa68d6f4990e6241e24464c">m&#95;LShr</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#aaf522908fe903018eb9b087dd6e49296">m&#95;Value</a>(BF), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a3aa1f5d3cd54d36e7e47f401a0118aeb">m&#95;ConstantInt</a>(CSR)),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">                            <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a3aa1f5d3cd54d36e7e47f401a0118aeb">m&#95;ConstantInt</a>(CSL)));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a313a633eb3049b90e931206183e1251ea6da89265a9a8b0b28eb4946bb2ec0c6d">Match</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CM = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">    LogicalSR = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a313a633eb3049b90e931206183e1251ea6da89265a9a8b0b28eb4946bb2ec0c6d">Match</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a25d956d9e0beadd47ce4bc255dfa811d">match</a>(In, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#ac1c7b78fe67245930be18441b77de500">m&#95;Shl</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a0c94f3ca4234f78cf22840e79087f3f2">m&#95;AShr</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#aaf522908fe903018eb9b087dd6e49296">m&#95;Value</a>(BF), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a3aa1f5d3cd54d36e7e47f401a0118aeb">m&#95;ConstantInt</a>(CSR)),</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a313a633eb3049b90e931206183e1251ea6da89265a9a8b0b28eb4946bb2ec0c6d">Match</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;Ty = BF-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Ty-&gt;isIntegerTy())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BW = Ty-&gt;getPrimitiveSizeInBits();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BW != 32 &amp;&amp; BW != 64)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t SR = CSR-&gt;getZExtValue();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t SL = CSL-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantint/#ac09a21c371a9c535cbc13e8f82503aec">getZExtValue</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!CM) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there was no and, and the shift left did not remove all potential</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sign bits created by the shift right, then extractu cannot reproduce</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!LogicalSR &amp;&amp; (SR &gt; SL))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a>(BW, ~0ULL, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#af34549c39d6f741fbdaf9a795aa306e9">lshr</a>(SR).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#acb9c55b6986369948507ca5241b4e411">shl</a>(SL);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CM = ConstantInt::get(Ctx, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// CM is the shifted-left mask. Shift it back right to remove the zero</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bits on least-significant positions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> M = CM-&gt;getValue().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#af34549c39d6f741fbdaf9a795aa306e9">lshr</a>(SL);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> = M.countr&#95;one();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// During the shifts some of the bits will be lost. Calculate how many</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of the original value will remain after shift right and then left.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t U = BW - std::max(SL, SR);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The width of the extracted field is the minimum of the original bits</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that remain after the shifts and the number of contiguous 1s in the mask.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t W = std::min(U, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (W == 0 || W == 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if the extracted bits are contained within the mask that it is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and-ed with. The extract operation will copy these bits, and so the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// mask cannot any holes in it that would clear any of the bits of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// extracted field.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!LogicalSR) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the shift right was arithmetic, it could have included some 1 bits.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It is still ok to generate extract, but only if the mask eliminates</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// those bits (i.e. M does not have any bits set beyond U).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#adcb96bd09d7c75c7669fa5f9d1190899">APInt::getHighBitsSet</a>(BW, BW-U);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (M.intersects(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>) || !M.isMask(W))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if M starts with a contiguous sequence of W times 1 bits. Get</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the low U bits of M (which eliminates the 0 bits shifted in on the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// left), and check if the result is APInt&#39;s &quot;mask&quot;:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!M.getLoBits(U).isMask(W))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> IRB(In);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/intrinsic/#a80add6b3b1cdaec560907995127adc16">Intrinsic::ID</a> IntId = (BW == 32) ? Intrinsic::hexagon&#95;S2&#95;extractu</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   : Intrinsic::hexagon&#95;S2&#95;extractup;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;NewIn =</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SL != 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NewIn = IRB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a9b6a3be6451cf6a789d9305d90751c40">CreateShl</a>(NewIn, SL, CSL-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#adb5c319f5905c1d3ca9eb5df546388c5">getName</a>());</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;DTN : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#acc2e6a2001a5f102f18060a53520e82b">children&lt;DomTreeNode&#42;&gt;</a>(DT-&gt;getNode(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>)))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NextI = std::prev(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
